= Tower of Hanoi Recursive Agent =

This agent solves the problem using a recursive strategy.  It tries to always moves the biggest out of place disk into its correct position.  The general description of the task from the [Agent_ToH_Simple Simple Tower of Hanoi Agent] still applies.
  
=== Soar capabilities ===
  * Basic PSCM functions: State Elaboration, Operator Proposal, Operator Evaluation, Internal Operator Application
  * Recursive problem solving
